title: Sessions
description: Supports reporting data for each charging session on a port at a station.  The reported data covers the start/end of the session, energy consumption, fees charged, and whether the session reached a successful conclusion.

port_id.description:
Unique identifier for specified port. (For NEVI or other Part 680 project, 
port_id must be same as the permanent station identifier provided
to third parties pursuant to CFR 23 ยง 680.116(c)(8)(iii).)

plug_start_datetime.description: Date and time of session initialization (plug in)

plug_end_datetime.description: Date and time of session termination (plug out)

charge_start_datetime.description: Date and time when charging began

session_duration.description: Total duration of session (plug in to plug out)

charging_duration.description:
Total duration of time when electricity was actively dispensed - may not
always be equal to the difference between charge_start_datetime
and charge_end_datetime due to charge interruptions or managed charging

energy_kwh.description: Electricity dispensed (in kilowatt-hours) during charging session

total_fee_charged.description:
The amount charged to the EV driver (in USD) where applicable - zero
if driver was not charged for an otherwise paid charger, NULL if charger is not paid

energy_fee.description: Fee (in USD) charged to user per kilowatt-hour

session_fee.description: Fee (in USD) charged to user per session

time_fee.description: Fee (in USD) charged to users per minute

successful_completion.description: Whether or not the session ended as expected

ended_by.description: Cause of the session to end (e.g., unplugged while charging).

start_soc.description: Battery state of charge at session start represented as a decimal between 0 and 1

end_soc.description: Battery state of charge at session end represented as a decimal between 0 and 1

error_code.description: Session error code(s) if any. Separated by comma if multiple.
